Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hi ~adityanalge - I'm working through the node sdk backlog with the maintainers and I noticed that you raised a PR with a fix for this - are you planning on continuing working on this? We are in the process of migrating over to github, so pull requests will be enabled soon.

Action.author: adityanalge
Action.body: Yes. It would be easier for me to raise a pr on GITHUB as I do not have experience with gerrit.

Action.author: lesleyannj
Action.body: ~bk201 are you working on a fix for this jira?
